location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map of the area south of the border between Afghanistan and Baluchistan

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 457 x 704mm, on sheet 592 x 799mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the area south of the border between Afghanistan and Baluchistan, from Quetta in the East to the area around Nusratabad on the border between Afghanistan and Persia [Iran] in the West.It depicts hydrology, including the river Helmand, and includes some indication of relief.The map is signed ‘G. W. [George Washington] Brazier-Creagh, Surgeon Major, A. M. S., In charge Seistan Mission. 1897.’
